verbose_text: Although we showed normal reactivity of circulating platelets to soluble agonists in static conditions (XREF_TABLE), the shedding of platelet membrane receptors GPIbalpha and GPVI induced by high shear, XREF_BIBR XREF_BIBR combined with the defect of high-molecular-weight von Willebrand factor, XREF_BIBR XREF_BIBR XREF_BIBR low-dose aspirin treatment, and thrombin inhibition by heparin, may explain our unexpected negative results.
